cons: Tarragon is not safe for women who are pregnant or breast-feeding.
Some people may be allergic to the herb.
description: Tarragon leaves contain antioxidant that helps to fight free radicals in the body. It will protect your body from any diseases.
Tarragon leaves to prevent the growth of cancer cells.
Tarragon leaves contain potassium mineral which plays the important role to regulate the heart contraction.
Tarragon leaves are rich in calcium and phosphorous. These minerals are essential for the bone formation and keep the bone stay strength.
